post.body: http://tinyurl.com/8oec9t
@careyjo I love Black Xmas! Such a good holiday slasher flick!
if you're ever approached by a market researcher asking about your style you're on What Not to Wear. Just BTW. I <3 Clinton Kelly.
I have now put on the Footloose soundtrack. It might be all I listen to all day long.
Dancing around the apartment to Footloose and loudly cheering for Kevin Bacon. It's good to start holidays this way.
Went to dinner with Sam and his mom. Then to Borders and Sam bought me a super neat planner. In my pjs and going to bed soon-ish.
Sam's mom gave me a set of Chanel glossimer lip glosses! Hooray for Chanel!
Apartment is pretty much spotless and smells good, ready for Sam's mom. Still doing our mounds of laundry however. We have a lot of clothes.
Awake and drinking coffee. Cleaning the apartment and doing laundry before Sam's mom comes. Gonna hang out w/ my momz for a bit too.
Ate some broccoli and now watching The Office. Gave Sam an early xmas present. Beer mugs!
Hanging out with my brother watching football. He's such a boy. Going to drink eggnog in a bit. YUM.
Went to Target with my bro. I got the best stuff ever. New comforter and new pots and pans! I heart Target.
Still kind of hungover. This is why I don't drink anymore. Going to brave Target in a bit. Should be fun.
Nursing a slight hangover. Drinking lots of water and eating cereal. Drinking with my brother is a bad idea but he buys me good vodka.
I am so mad I got a B in my Persian art class. It's just because my teacher hated me. She sucks and I will never take a class w/her again.
It's officially winter. Sigh. Snow boots and jackets abound. I miss fall and layering. Although winter does give me an excuse to wear fur.
Looking for the perfect brown vintage boots in a size 8. Etsying and ebaying. Going to look at Buff Ex tomorrow. They're somewhere.
Magazine reading day! Watching Ace of Cakes too. Lined up a few more craft projects for the break.
Lazy Sunday so far. Woke up late. Drinking a superfood juice. Not too sure what I'm doing today. Hanging out with my bro later I'm sure.
My brother drove in from NE to surprise me. Hooray! And I got presents! Christmas break rules.
